newsitem.title: USA: Teltrend sees growth via new products.
newsitem.headline: Teltrend sees growth via new products.

text.p: Teltrend Inc's transition to newer products enhances its prospects for continued solid growth in fiscal 1997, president Howard Kirby said in a statement.
"Teltrend's growth continues to be driven not only by our established products, but also by new products in each of our four business areas," Kirby said.

Earlier Wednesday Teltrend, which designs and manufactures products used by telephone companies to provide voice and data services over the telephone network, reported July 27 yearend earnings of $1.86 per share on sales of $85.9 million.
